description.hltext_display: 加强党内基层民主建设
科学谋划“十二五”发展
description.content:
科学发展靠项目推动，发展转型靠项目支撑，社会和谐靠项目保障。麻城市紧紧围绕实施“开发西城新区，发展集群经济，推进全民行动，建设名城强市”的战略新举措，积极谋划大项目，编制大规划，推进大转型，将麻城建设成为地区性中心城市、综合性交通枢纽、国家级园林城市和特色产业基地，努力向中等规模的名城强市目标迈进。
谋划基础项目，构建交通大枢纽
随着京九铁路、汉麻铁路、沪汉蓉快速铁路和大广高速、沪蓉高速、麻竹高速的相继建成通车，麻城成为鄂东综合性交通枢纽和继武汉、襄樊之后的“湖北第三大交通枢纽城市”。依托大枢纽，构建大网络，麻城重点谋划和规划了一批交通基础设施建设项目。
在对外交通网络建设上，积极争取国家级的综合性交通枢纽总体定位，全力争取大别山随麻安（随州―麻城―安庆）铁路、麻六（麻城至六安）铁路货运专线、京九铁路客运专线、麻瑞（麻城―江西瑞昌）高速公路、麻城节点联络线（连接沪汉蓉铁路与京九铁路）等重大项目，大力支持麻竹高速公路等重点项目建设。
在境内交通网络建设上，重点谋划“二环三改四联”大交通布局（“二环”即麻城境内内环线、外环线建设；“三改”即国道、省道、县道全面改造省级；“四联”即大广连城区、麻东连北站、白果连大广、麻竹连大广），实现公铁零距离换乘和货运无缝对接，着力构建外部通达、内部顺畅和内外对接、辐射周边的交通大网络，全面提升麻城的综合性交通枢纽功能。
谋划特色项目，做强产业大基地
特色就是竞争力。麻城的县域经济就是由特色鲜明的工业、农业、旅游、商贸物流“四大集团军”构成。在“十二五”规划中，积极谋划和规划特色产业大项目，努力打造武汉城市圈重要的特色产业基地。
工业方面，重点围绕汽车配件、冶金机械、花岗石材、电力能源、农产品加工“五大集群”，积极争取省级汽摩配加工集散基地、中部地区石材加工集散中心、全国废钢铁加工配送中心等重点项目，全力实施兴业钢铁炉料公司上市工程、管业培育工程、纺织服装扩规工程，努力做强做大特色工业。
农业方面，重点围绕“三乡三业”，即中国菊花之乡、中国油茶之乡、中国板栗之乡、蔬菜产业、畜牧产业、桑茶药产业，积极争取国家级油茶基地、国家级菊花基地、国家级板栗基地、全国畜牧大县（市）、国家东桑西移示范基地、全国优质稻米基地、大别山木本粮油产业基地、大别山无公害蔬菜基地、大别山无公害名贵鱼基地等特色项目，全力推进5万亩无公害福白菊、10万亩无公害蔬菜等特色产业基地建设。
旅游方面，积极争取和推进大别山文化旅游中心、龟山镇和歧亭镇湖北旅游名镇、乘马岗镇红色旅游强镇等重点项目，全力推进“三山（龟峰山、五脑山、九龙山）一村（杏花村）一线（红色精品旅游线路）一大片（乡村农家乐）”旅游板块建设和五星级大酒店、大别山民俗博物馆等项目，着力创建中国优秀旅游目的地、全省旅游强市、大别山旅游门户城市和武汉城市圈旅游服务基地。
商贸方面，积极推进金通湾、孝感乡街、大别山农林产品批发市场等大型商贸物流项目的建设，积极争取中部大型煤炭储备基地、石油储备基地、内陆散粮中转站等重点项目，努力建设大别山区商贸物流中心。
谋划转型项目，拓宽发展大空间
加快转变经济发展方式是“十二五”时期发展的主线。麻城抢前争先谋划转型项目，先人一步拓宽发展空间。以项目的策划、争取和实施为依托，整合资源和力量，着力打造大别山革命老区经济社会发展试验区示范城市、武汉城市圈转型发展试点城市，建设中部地区宜居宜游宜商城市。
谋划西城新区开发。谋划和着手推进95平方公里的西城新区开发，按照“工贸新区，生态新城”的总体定位，编制了“一轴五园”为框架的总体规划，努力把西城新区建设成为武汉城市圈低碳试验区、改革开放的先行区和城市形象的展示区。
谋划试验项目。积极争取设立麻城大别山革命老区经济社会发展试验区示范市和省级低碳经济试点城市，为麻城的“转型试验”和“两型试验”赢得先机。加快建设废钢铁加工配送示范基地，争取国家设立“循环经济产业园”，支持兴业公司争创国家级循环经济示范企业，建设中部钢铁炉料加工集散中心，争取建设国家级废旧汽车拆解基地、废旧家电拆解处理中心。继续大力推进大别山电厂粉煤灰再利用等循环经济项目，拉长循环经济产业链条。
谋划生态项目。围绕创建国家级园林城市、环保模范城市和绿化模范县市，大力推进生态环保项目建设，创建一批国家级“环境优美乡镇”和“生态村”。继续打好“老区牌”、“大别山牌”、“长江支流―举水河牌”，积极争取和推进大别山生态功能区、革命老区水土保持综合治理、大别山举水河流域生态治理、举水河生态保护、浮桥河水库水土保持治理、水土保持世行贷款等工程项目建设，加快启动城市生活垃圾处理场、城区污水收集管网、排水管网等城市环保设施项目建设。
谋划新兴能源项目。麻城具有发展新兴能源的资源优势和产业基础，瞄准国家能源产业调整新方向，积极谋划争取风力发电、抽水蓄能发电和太阳能光伏发电等新兴能源项目，加快推进亚太生物质发电项目和聚和水电梯级开发项目建设，努力将麻城打造成为武汉城市圈重要的新兴能源产业基地。
（作者系麻城市委书记）

description.hltext_display: 传承弘扬蒸菜美食文化
description.content:
天门市地处江汉平原北部，是茶圣陆羽故里、全国著名的内陆侨乡和文化之乡。2005年以来，天门连续五次入选全国最具投资潜力中小城市百强，连续六届被评为中部县域经济百强。今年4月，天门被中国烹饪协会认定为“中国蒸菜之乡”，并成功举办首届中国・天门蒸菜美食文化节。进一步 ，将对彰显城市魅力，提升城市品位，增强天门核心竞争力和对外影响力，起到积极的推动作用。
以独特的蒸菜美食文化丰富城市个性
文化品牌是构筑城市个性的重要元素。天门城市文化特征较多，其中蒸菜美食文化在国内独树一帜，具有较强的从无形转化为有形的资源优势，充分挖掘天门独特的蒸菜历史文化底蕴，有利于培育天门鲜明的城市个性。
源远流长的蒸菜历史是构建天门独特美食文化的基础。考古资料证明，中国独特的炊具――甑在新石器时代产生后，“蒸”食之法就开始运用。在距今五千多年前的天门石家河文化遗址中，就发现了大量的陶甑、陶罐等蒸食器具，证明天门先民在很早以前就已开始使用蒸具制作食品。在天门，蒸菜又被称为“匡凤菜”和“绿林菜”。相传汉代绿林起义王匡、王凤兄弟带领义军至天门白湖，军中粮草紧缺，义军将仅剩粮食磨成米粉，拌和大量野菜甑蒸，一举解决军粮问题而渡过难关。由此蒸菜四处传开，逐步为社会各阶层所接受，蒸菜品种、技法不断丰富完善，最终形成天门蒸菜美食体系，并成为鄂菜代表。
别具一格的蒸技八法是构建天门独特美食文化的支撑。蒸菜技法在各大菜系中均有所体现，北方人惯蒸主食，南方人善蒸菜肴。天门蒸菜经过历代蒸菜大师的凝练创新，蒸菜技法体系得到不断完善，成为全国蒸技最多的菜系，构成了天门蒸菜独特的技艺特色。天门蒸菜以清蒸、粉蒸和炮蒸三法为纲，进而拓展了包蒸、酿蒸、封蒸、扣蒸、造型蒸等技法，统称为“蒸菜八技”。天门八蒸的形成，使天门蒸菜由几个零星品种发展成一个种类众多、技法完整的菜品体系，将天门蒸菜的内涵和外延发展到了极致，充分彰显了天门蒸菜的个性特色。
精彩纷呈的蒸菜文化是天门城市个性的重要特征。天门蒸菜的繁荣发展与天门所处地理环境、生态环境紧密相关。天门地属古云梦泽区域，千里沃野，食物品种繁多。“无菜不蒸、无宴不蒸”，形成了天门“食以蒸为先”的饮食传统。这种观念也逐步渗透到天门人的民俗、礼仪观念。“蒸菜纷呈，根在天门”是对天门独特美食文化的客观评价，在塑造城市个性中具有独特的品牌效应和文化效应。
以蒸菜美食文化开发城市软实力
美食文化是提升城市生活品质、提高幸福指数的重要因素。推动美食文化与城市转型融合发展，对塑造城市形象、开发文化软实力具有显性作用。通过弘扬传承蒸菜美食文化，以蒸菜美食文化引领城市文化发展，打造天门蒸菜城市文化名片，进一步改善天门的人文环境，夯实文化软实力建设的人文基础。
创新饮食文化。在全国范围内，天门是唯一同时具有饮、食两种历史文化资源的城市。天门是茶圣陆羽的故乡，是我国茶文化的发源地之一，茶道传承深入市井村野。而天门蒸菜制作过程，避免了中国传统烹饪技法“煎炒烧炸”中的高油脂摄入及油烟污染，符合当代健康饮食规律。茶饮食蒸，是当代天门人奉行的健康养生之道，茶人与厨师、茶道与蒸技在天门人饮食生活中得到完美体现。要加强茶道蒸技专业技术人才队伍培养，加大茶道蒸技对广大民众的普及力度，进一步强化社会整体的健康饮食观念；加大各类茶馆、蒸菜馆的招商建设力度，发展影响力大、吸引力强、知名度高的连锁服务，提升城市健康饮食消费档次与水平，着力打造“茶饮食蒸”、健康生活之城。
拓展民俗文化。蒸菜作为天门主食之道，蒸菜美食文化与人们生活紧密相连。人们在祭先祀祖、婚丧嫁娶等宴请宾客时蒸菜是必备之食，并作为一项重要礼仪。在天门民间素有“三蒸九扣十大碗，不架蒸笼不请客”的说法。同时，天门蒸菜品种丰富，一些菜品历史悠久，如钟惺鳅、元春鱼、状元糕、“天门素三蒸”、五彩义河蚶等菜品名列《中国名菜谱》，每道菜品都有一个美丽传说和动人故事。要充分挖掘蒸菜美食文化的民俗特征，加快蒸菜美食文化与其他民俗文化协调融合发展，充分运用天门皮影、花鼓戏、糖塑、民歌、渔鼓等具有江汉平原特色的民俗文艺，演绎和展现蒸菜历史、名人、故事、技巧、礼仪等方面的文化特色，创作一批文艺精品，不断丰富蒸菜美食文化内涵。
发展休闲文化。依托本地文化旅游产业发展，加强旅游线路中品牌蒸菜馆、茶馆建设，形成文化旅游蒸菜美食特色，打造“健康旅行、吃在天门”的休闲文化旅游品牌。要突出“陆羽茶文化”、“天门蒸菜美食文化”、“石家河文化”、“佛祖山宗教文化”四大主题，通过立体式开发、多层级推进、精品化建设，着力打造“文化天门，饮食名城”的天门旅游品牌形象。
以蒸菜文化产业发展助推城市产业转型
加强文化与产业的对接，推动产业优化升级是城市转型发展的重大战略选择。大力发展蒸菜文化产业，加快蒸菜美食文化产品的产业化步伐，打响天门“蒸菜之乡”品牌。要进一步完善蒸菜产业规划，建立蒸菜品牌发展体系，切实把蒸菜产业做实做大做强。
着力培育蒸菜产业龙头。重点加强龙头企业、品牌菜馆、蒸菜大师的培育，形成一批知名度高、影响力大、综合实力强的领军企业和人物。依托现有粮油加工企业，加大招商引资力度，加强蒸菜产品技术创新与开发，大力发展速食、熟食产品加工，着力培育蒸菜加工龙头企业，形成天门食品加工产业特色。加强天门蒸菜馆建设，选择培育一批品牌蒸菜馆。大力实施“名师出名菜，名品扬名店”战略，培育一批蒸菜烹饪大师。
加快发展蒸菜产业体系。围绕与龙头企业配套，大力发展蒸菜辅料、调料、包装产品以及蒸具设计、生产等配套加工企业；大力发展蒸菜产业农产品生产基地，大力推进农产品标准化、生态化、规模化生产，推动农业生产方式转变。加强城市餐饮市场建设，完善城区和旅游景区品牌餐馆布局规划，大力发展以蒸菜为主题的农家乐，不断提升餐饮服务业水平。积极推进产业对接，大力推动天门蒸菜产业与流通业、旅游业、传媒业的有机融合，努力打造蒸菜产业集群。
不断完善产业扶持政策。制订蒸菜产业发展行业标准，推动蒸菜产业规范化、标准化发展。进一步扩大与中国烹饪协会的合作，拓展与相关食品科研机构的合作，采取产学研结合的方式加大蒸菜菜品、蒸具产品、快餐食品等方面的研发力度，强化蒸菜产业发展技术支撑。高度重视蒸菜专业技术人才培育，加大蒸菜技术普及力度。加快蒸菜“走出去”步伐，大力支持蒸菜名牌企业、连锁企业走出天门，鼓励向海外输出蒸菜厨师，开展国际间饮食文化交流，提高天门蒸菜的国际知名度。
（作者系天门市委书记）

La nieve obliga a circular con cadenas en tres altos de la provincia de León
description.content: Los copos de nieve caídos y acumulados en las últimas horas obligan a usar cadenas en estos momentos en tres altos de montaña de la provincia de León, según los datos aportados por la Dirección General de Tráfico (DGT) y recogidos por Europa Press.

description.hltext_display: ontv股壇mm:長實分拆 利反映價值?
Thang Duy lộ dấu hiệu tuổi già
description.author: Việt Báo
description.content: Bạn có thể gửi nhận xét, góp ý hay liên hệ về bài viết bằng cách gửi thư điện tử tới vietbao.vn. description.hltext_display: 一号文件聚焦 水利股佳境渐入
description.content:
为期两天的中央农村工作会议１２月２１日召开。会议将明确２０１１年中央农村工作的目标和任务，并形成２０１１年中央一号文件的主要内容。
市场分析人士指出，２０１１年的１号文件中，水利建设依然将是农业投资的重中之重。而农村水利建设主要包括两个方面，即农村饮水安全工程和农业灌溉设施建设，后者的投资约为饮水安全工程的３倍。
水利股再度站在Ａ股市场的风口浪尖，呈现一路走强之势，此次农村工作会议的一号文件会否聚焦水利股，其后市走势如何？
政策频出 水利股利好
１５日开始，水利股盘中再次走强，葛洲坝、安徽水泥、钱江水利、大禹节水等个股盘中均呈走强势头。而这也是继１２月６日之后，水利股的第二波走强。
“政策频出，水利投资将进入实质性阶段。”东方证券刘俊告诉记者，一系列的政策出台，水利股投资值得看好。
近日闭幕的中央经济工作会议提出，要“把水利作为农村基础设施建设的重点”对水利板块构成较大地利好刺激。
紧接着，１２月１２日水利部党组书记、部长陈雷主持召开水利部党组扩大会议。他强调，对农田水利建设、中小河流治理、中小水库除险加固、山洪及地质灾害防治、节约用水、蓄滞洪区建设、农村饮水安全、控制农村面源污染、荒漠化和石漠化治理，重点流域、区域、行业污染治理，应对极端气候事件和重大地质灾害监测预警和抗灾减灾能力，推进水价改革等工作做出安排部署，为进一步做好水利工作指明了方向。
“下一阶段，水利部还将认真筹备开好全国水利工作会议和全国水利规划计划工作会议，对“十二五”和明年水利工作做出全面部署。”刘俊表示，由于政策预期，水利股在农村工作会议之后的走势仍然十分乐观。
【1】 【2】

description.hltext_display: Of Onions and Sachin Tendulkar
description.author: Priyanka Bhardwaj
description.content:
Two recent events have evoked differing emotions in me: the skyrocketing prices of onions and Sachin Tendulkar’s world record of fifty test hundreds.
While one was of sheer anger due to official mismanagement that extends to so many other spheres such as education, health services, infrastructure, electricity…the other was pure ecstasy at the achievement of one of my favorite sportsmen.
As things stand, onions have out-priced apples? At Rs.80-90 a kilogram onions are marching on the way to become a food of the Gods from a staple Indian culinary ingredient.
Prices of the commodity has soared more than hundred per cent and will not abate in a hurry as agriculture minister Sharad Pawar has said. It surely makes my mother feel very unhappy.
Thank heavens Sachin too soars as this makes me feel very happy. I have had my share of favorite cricketers, without following the game too closely, I must admit --- the effervescent Jonty Rhodes and going further back videos of very handsome Imran Khan at his prime are simply delicious; lately it has been the Dhoni smile.
I also follow Sachin and his amazing performances despite immense pressures, expectation and instant criticism to any failure by a cricket crazy Indian population.
The further appeal is that despite such greatness the man is an embodiment of impeccable demeanor, humble in his behavior with fans (no finger pointing or monkey faces ever attributed to him), without a hint of scandal in his personal life, unlike so many others who lose it with fame and money.
I reasoned a connect between Sachin’s greatness and onion prices --- even if very little of Sachin’s enormous discipline, efficiency, integrity, excellence and humbleness rubs onto others who manage a bit of our lives, our people could be so much better off. They would surely not cry over onions.
If only our political and administrators manage to execute a modicum of the qualities that the Sachin stands for. I am intrigued that two such stark phenomenon’s co-exist in our country – rapacious corruption due to land scams and the like and Sachin with his other world qualities.
The onion crisis is serious. The Manmohan government, already facing a crisis of confidence due to the telecom scam and electoral reverses in Bihar, needs to get its act right on onions quickly. Staple foods carry huge emotive appeal with the masses.
Salt was a potent political symbol used by Mahatma Gandhi to galvanize the nation against the British Raj. Nearer still 1998 exorbitant prices of onions had led to Bharatiya Janata Party government weeping due to an electoral defeat in its strong hold state of Delhi and two more.
The BJP has not managed to win back Delhi since. It will be an irony if it does due to the onion crisis.
Food shortages are also no aliens in western world. The roots of such scarcity led to bread-riots that finally resulted in the 1789 French revolution. In near China monarchical dynasties have their rise and decline linked to food shortages coming from mismanaged famines and droughts.
The Indian government needs to get its act right. Or it will be shown the door by a restive electorate quicker than a Sachin six…now is that possible?

description.hltext_display: 感动：胃癌女孩命运多舛妙龄而逝：她走了 再也不会饿">感动：胃癌女孩命运多舛妙龄而逝：她走了 再也不会饿
description.content:
贺红慧，衡南县江口镇池塘村人，生于1989年3月6日（农历正月廿九），因罹患胃癌，2010年12月16日去世。该图摄于2010年4月27日，长沙王陵公园，她正在拍写真集。图/记者杨抒怀
没有任何征兆，却又在意料之中。那个孩子，那个家庭的希望，在2010年12月16日画上了句点。
这天，湖南跌入寒冬。衡南县江口镇池塘村一栋两层砖房外，拳头大小的橘子还挂在枝头，鹅毛般的大雪，一点点盖住绿叶。
零点30分，21岁女孩贺红慧，在自己的哭泣声中离开了这个世界。此前，她已被胃癌折磨一年。（详见本报今年4月中下旬系列报道）
窗外，公鸡开始打鸣。天地因积雪而变得明亮，人们躲在温暖的被窝里做梦。
父亲贺德生说，孩子走的时候，一定感觉不到饿了。
本报记者王欢 实习生黄天雄 衡阳报道
患病
自出生起，贺红慧就体会着多舛的命运。
3岁那年，母亲放牛时被雷击中死亡，她与父亲相依为命。
也就是那年，洪水冲掉了他们的茅草房，之后，他们一直借住在别人家，靠父亲打零工维持生活。
2008年，小慧进入湘潭一所大学念书。
如果命运的车轮不偏离轨道，她应该在3年之后就能实现当初跟父亲许下的诺言：“赚足钱，把家里供我读书欠下的债还清。”
她没有料到，厄运会再次降临——今年初，大二下学期开学不久，刚过完21岁生日的她，被医生诊断出患有胃癌，而且是“最晚期、最恶性”。
她住进了医院，开始与癌症搏斗。
直至媒体介入，一个此前不为人知的事实呈现在人们面前：这个女孩之所以患上癌症，与她长期极不规律的饮食习惯有很大关系——父亲贺德生说，大学期间，小慧为了省钱，每天只吃一顿饭，有时还是两个馒头。
小慧的初中同学盛利洁说，事实上，小慧自初中寄宿时，就是每天一个面包或一杯粥。大学室友谭京亚说，小慧很要强，吃饭时总不和她们一起，同学都不知道她来自单亲家庭，更不知道她每天只吃一顿饭。
没有人愿意相信，这样一个年代，还会有孩子为每天吃上三餐饱饭而发愁。也没有人知道，这个孩子每天饥肠辘辘，心里承受的委屈和责任。
今年4月，小慧的主治医生告诉记者，依小慧当前的病情，她可能活不过3个月，最多能撑半年。
谁也不忍心将这个事实告诉还在憧憬重返校园的女孩。医生与家人商议决定，共同保守一个善意的谎言：不告诉她真实病情。
生命倒计时的日子里，身边所有人都绷紧了弦。
治疗
4月27日，在热心人士帮助下，小慧实现了她人生中第一个美丽心愿：拍一套写真。
苍白的脸，在阳光下肆意绽放，21岁的青春，在鲜花湖水间跳跃。公园里，很多市民停下脚步，为她鼓掌。
她的父亲，沉默、悲伤，固执地不愿看女儿——他知道，眼前美丽的女儿，珍贵得近乎残忍。
小慧说，她会永远记住这一天，以后，要当故事讲给她的孙子听。她盼望自己的病能快点好起来。
这个坚强的故事感动了很多人。
住院期间，许多市民冒着大雨给她送来医药费，送来水果，送来热腾腾的饭菜。一位80多岁的老红军带着孙子前来，落下了眼泪。大家都希望，这个孩子要尽快好起来，不再挨饿。
此后的两个月，医生给小慧进行了效果相对明显的靶向治疗。她的脸开始变得红润，饭量也比以前大了。
7月份，小慧的头发开始掉得厉害。化疗让她的脸长满了斑点。
她似乎有所察觉，经常问爸爸：我的病，到底能治好吗？
9月17日，小慧开始写日记。扉页上写着：当你们看到这个日记本时，我已经离开了。
这个乳白色封面的日记本，直到她离开，才被父亲在床铺底下发现。
日记只记了10多页，内容基本都是她对生的渴望，对命运的不甘，对朋友、家人和好心人的感谢。

description.hltext_display: Ramsauer räumt Defizite bei der Bahn ein
description.content:
Berlin (dpa) - Bundesverkehrsminister Peter Ramsauer hat angesichts der aktuellen Verkehrsprobleme jahrelange Versäumnisse bei der Bahn eingeräumt. Man habe mit erheblichen technischen Problemen zu kämpfen, die aus der Vergangenheit herrührten, sagte der CSU- Politiker im ARD-Morgenmagazin. In den letzten zehn Jahren sei zudem an der sogenannten Bereithaltung gespart worden. Die Probleme ließen sich nicht von heute auf morgen beheben. Die Politik werde zusammen mit den einzelnen Verkehrsträgern alles daran setzt, dass die Dinge in Ordnung gebracht würden, so Ramsauer.
Artikel vom 22.12.2010

Cuatro provincias, en alerta por nieve
description.content:
Foto: EP MA
MADRID, 22 Dic. (EUROPA PRESS) - Cuatro provincias estarán en alerta por nieve, para este miércoles, nueve por vientos y cinco por lluvias, según la predicción de la Agencia Estatal de Meteorología (AEMET).
Concretamente, Lugo, Ourense, Zamora, León, Cantabria, registrarán alerta amarilla (riesgo) por nevadas, que será naranja (riesgo importante) en algunas zonas de Asturias. Mientras que las alertas por lluvia se esperan en Sevilla, Córdoba, Granada, con especial riesgo en Málaga y Cádiz. Además, las alertas por viento se registrarán en la totalidad de las Islas Canarias, así como en A Coruña y Pontevedra.
Así, en la Península y las Islas Baleares se producirán precipitaciones débiles o moderadas, que serán persistentes en el sur de Andalucía, donde irán acompañadas de tormentas, pudiendo ser localmente fuertes. También podrán ser localmente persistentes en el extremo noroeste peninsular y en Cataluña, tendiendo a ser mas débiles en el sudeste y Baleares. Además, en las Islas Canarias, se esperan cielos nubosos con lluvias débiles en el norte.
Por otro lado, la cota de nieve descenderá en el extremo noroeste peninsular entre 500 y 1.000 metros, mientras que en el resto de la mitad noroeste lo hará entre 1.000 y 1.500 y en el resto de la Península entre 1.300 y 1.800 metros. Además, se registrarán bancos de niebla matinales en la Comunidad Valenciana, Murcia, Aragón y Castilla-la Mancha.
Las temperaturas irán en descenso ligero a moderado en la mitad suroeste peninsular y en ascenso ligero a moderado en el nordeste y con pocos cambios en el resto. Los vientos serán de moderado a fuerte del norte en Galicia y Cantábrico, de componente este en Canarias y litoral de Andalucía, con intervalos de muy fuerte en el litoral oeste andaluz y de Galicia. Finalmente, serán moderados de componente sur en el resto de la Península, con intervalos de fuerte en zonas altas.

description.hltext_display: 雷：“宜春 一座叫春城市”雷人语获奖 系精心策划">雷：“宜春 一座叫春城市”雷人语获奖 系精心策划
description.content:
来源: 每日经济新闻 网友评论 0 条 进入论坛
“一座叫春的城市”宜春雷人策划竟获奖
每经记者 李卓 发自北京
“宜春，一座叫春的城市”，这条2010红遍全国的政府旅游宣传“雷语”，原系精心策划。
昨日 （12月21日），《每日经济新闻》记者在首届中国休闲创新奖暨第四届中国最佳旅游供应商颁奖典礼上获悉，这条曾经出现在宜春旅游政务网站首页，轰动一时的“雷人”宣传语，原来竟是宜春市旅游局联合国内知名旅游营销策划专家共同策划的营销策略，并获首届“休闲、旅游营销创新奖”。
2010年2月8日，宜春旅游政务网在首页刊登了“宜春，一座叫春的城市”旅游宣传语；2月13日，名为“虫虫特工”的网友在宜春新闻网的明月论坛发表了题为《惊爆宜春旅游网的虎年雷人标语——“宜春，一座叫春的城市”》的网帖，之后迅速被转帖到全国各大网站的论坛，这条“雷人”宣传语让宜春红遍全国。不可否认的是，江西宜春今年凭借这条“雷人”宣传语一炮打响，带动了当地旅游经济的发展。

Hyderabad: The condition of Telegu Desam Party President N Chandrababu
At one point Chandrababu
A six-member team of expert doctors from NIMS is constantly monitoring the leader of the opposition.
Doctors then wanted to shift the Leader of Opposition to the Intensive Care Unit, but he resisted that attempt as well.
"We are now trying to convert the same room into an ICU," doctors at Nizam's Institute of Medical Sciences said.
Chandrababu
"But he refused to heed. He looked very weak," they said.
They strongly denounced the Congress government's indifferent attitude and said it should immediately take steps to resolve the issue.
Meanwhile, TDP and Left parties gathered around the district Collectorates in the state demanding that the government concede the demands raised by Chandrababu
Former Home Minister T Devender Goud and CPI state Secretary K Narayana led the siege at the Ranga Reddy district Collector's office here. They were taken into preventive custody along with scores of party workers.
Information Technology professionals took out a march from KBR Park to NIMS in solidarity with Chandrababu

description.hltext_display: Kẻ trộm lộ tẩy vì bị… ngã
description.author: Việt Báo
description.content:
Tags: Hàng Gà, MiyaZaki Hidehi, Hàng Bồ, Xanh Pôn, USD Úc, Trấn Khát Chân, điện thoại di động, Quận Hoàn Kiếm, vào bệnh viện, người nước ngoài, Nguyễn Văn Minh, tài sản, khách sạn, tạm trú, điều tra, ca
Hôm nay (22/12), Công an phường Hàng Bồ vừa cho biết đã điều tra làm rõ vụ trộm cắp tài sản của người nước ngoài xảy ra tại địa bàn phường.
Trước đó ngày (13/12), ông MiyaZaki Hidehi người Nhật Bản tạm trú ở phòng 501 khách sạn 24 Hàng Gà đến CA phường Hàng Bồ trình báo: Hồi 4h30 ngày 14/12, ông bị kẻ gian đột nhập vào phòng 501 khách sạn 25 Hàng Gà nơi ông tạm trú trộm 200 USD, 1.000 Yên Nhật và 9 triệu đồng.
Ngày 22/12, CA phường đã làm rõ đối tượng là Nguyễn Văn Minh (SN 1964, ở ngách 64 Trấn Khát Chân) đã đột nhập vào khách sạn 24 Hàng Gà trộm cắp. Sau khi lấy trộm số tài sản trên, Minh đã bị ngã vào bệnh viện Xanh Pôn điều trị.
CA đã thu hồi tài sản trả ông MiyaZaki Hidehi. Ngoài ra còn thu trong người Minh 200 USD Úc và 200 USD, khám xét nhà Minh thu 3 điện thoại di động, 2 máy nghe nhạc và một số giấy tờ khác.
CA quận Hoàn Kiếm đang điều tra mở rộng.

description.hltext_display: Le mari de Zsa Zsa Gabor hospitalisé hier à Los Angeles
description.content: Le mari de l'actrice américaine Zsa Zsa Gabor, le fantasque "prince" allemand Frederic von Anhalt, a été hospitalisé hier à Los Angeles après s'être collé l'oeil par mégarde avec un tube de glu utilisé par son épouse pour fixer ses faux ongles. Selon le site TMZ.com, spécialisé dans la vie des célébrités, le prince auto-proclamé -- il affirme avoir été adopté, adulte, par une princesse allemande -- s'est trompé de tube alors qu'il faisait sa toilette matinale. Alors qu'il voulait se verser quelques gouttes de collyre dans les yeux, il s'est emparé par erreur de la colle pour faux ongles de sa femme et s'est retrouvé avec les paupières collées, incapable de rouvrir l'oeil. Il a été hospitalisé dans la journée et devait ressortir dans la soirée. Le prince, âgé de 66 ans, connaît bien les hôpitaux de Los Angeles, pour y avoir conduit sa femme à de nombreuses reprises ces derniers mois, après plusieurs incidents de santé qui ont fait craindre pour sa vie plus d'une fois. Si son épouse, aujourd'hui âgée de 93 ans, est célèbre pour ses frasques de jeunesse, son neuvième mari est lui aussi un personnage haut en couleurs. Il avait entre autre revendiqué la paternité de la fille d'Anna Nicole Smith après la mort de cette dernière en 2007, et s'était lancé début 2010 dans la course à l'élection du gouverneur de Californie, avant de se retirer.

description.hltext_display: Tauwetter im Süden, Minusgrade im Norden
description.content: Berlin (dpa) - Je nördlicher, desto kälter: Während im Norden nach wie vor Minusgrade herrschen, zeigen die Thermometer im Süden Deutschlands deutlich mildere Werte an. Entspannung auch im Flugverkehr: Auf dem Frankfurter Flughafen sind seit dem Morgen wieder alle Start- und Landebahnen in Betrieb.

description.hltext_display: Naidus fast enters sixth day, condition worsens
description.author: Agencies
description.content:
The condition of President N Chandrababu Naidu worsened further today as he refused to consume even liquid, on the sixth day of his indefinite hunger strike seeking justice for farmers.
At one point, Naidu closed the door of his room from inside and did not let anyone venture inside. His wife Bhuvaneswari, family members and senior leaders of TDP tried to persuade Naidu to drink fluids but to no avail.
A six-member team of expert doctors from NIMS is constantly monitoring the Opposition leader's health.
Doctors then wanted to shift the leader to the Intensive Care Unit, but he resisted that attempt as well.
We are now trying to convert the same room into an ICU, doctors at the Nizams Institute of Medical Sciences said.
Naidus nephews and film stars NTR (Junior) and Kalyan Ram visited him in the hospital today and pleaded with him to give up the fast in view of his health.
But he refused to listen. He looked very weak, they said.
They strongly denounced the Congress governments indifferent attitude and said it should immediately take steps to resolve the issue.
Meanwhile, TDP and Left parties gathered around the district collectorates in the state demanding the government concede to the demands raised by Naidu and rescue the distressed farmers.
Former Home Minister T. Devender Goud and CPI state Secretary K. Narayana led the siege at the Ranga Reddy district collectors office here. They were taken into preventive custody along with scores of party workers.
... contd.

description.hltext_display: Black Swan, True Grit, The Fighter and The Kids Are Alright Won’t Get an Oscar Nomination
description.author: noreply@allvoices.com
description.content:
The films Black Swan, True Grit, The Fighter and have been getting plenty of award nominations and are contenders for the Oscars. But there is one category in which they will not be eligible for. And that is Best Original Score.
All four films have been deemed ineligible for the category after the Academy ruled their works were "diluted by the use of tracked themes or other pre-existing music." Two years ago, THE DARK KNIGHT was declared ineligible for Best Original Score only to have the Academy reverse its decision a month later after a public outcry. There has also been some controversy about INCEPTION's score, which features a slowed down version of Edith Piaf's "Non, je ne Regrette Rien." Meanwhile, the same issues that plagued BLACK SWAN - featuring excerpts of existing classical music - doesn't seem to be an issue for THE KING'S SPEECH, which was declared eligible despite featuring excerpts from existing works throughout the film.

description.hltext_display: Warm Russian, Indian ties outlive Cold War
description.content:
Indian PM Singh sits beside Russia's President Medvedev during a joint news conference in New Delhi
(Reuters) -
NEW DELHI (Reuters) - Russian President Dmitry Medvedev's warm reception in India, including wrapping up a stealth fighter jets deal potentially worth $35 billion, dispels Russian fears its former Cold War ally has turned to the West.
Prime Minister Manmohan Singh, who has in the space of a few months hosted all the leaders of the permanent members of the U.N. Security Council, said "Russia is a time-tested friend of India" at the start of Medvedev's two-day trip on Tuesday.
Russia has been India's close economic and political partner since Soviet days, and monopolized India's defense market for decades, but India wants to reduce its reliance on one country to reflect its growing influence on the world stage.
"President Dmitry Medvedev has done well to dispel the growing misperception that Indo-Russian relations have lost their salience amidst India's new warmth with the U.S. and the West," the Indian Express newspaper said in an editorial on Wednesday.
Medvedev will spend his last day in India touring the Taj Mahal in Agra, meeting students in Mumbai and touring "Bollywood" film studios.
Russia joined the United States and France in offering support for India for a permanent seat at an expanded Security Council to reflect the growing might of emerging economies.
India says a seat on the Security Council would reflect the G20 nation's importance as its $1.3 trillion economy helps spur global growth and its government exerts more and more influence over issues from Doha trade to climate talks.
India's growing ties with the United States, underscored by a landmark civil nuclear deal, has made Russia ill at ease.
India, the second fastest-growing major economy in the world after China, is one of the top arms importers and plans to spend about $50 billion on defense in the next few years to upgrade its aging Soviet-era arsenal, mainly to counter a perceived China threat.
World leaders, accompanied by top executives, are hungry to secure a slice of India's economy, expected to grow at near-double digit rates for the next decade, making it one of the five largest economies in the world by 2020.
BARGAINING POWER
Russia has long seen India as a counterweight to China and a potential ally in Afghanistan.
"The strategic, economic and political importance of Russia can not be overstated," said Bhaskar Roy, a New Delhi-based strategic affairs columnist.
"India needs Russia for its energy requirements, to counter-balance China, for retaining influence in Afghanistan once the Western troops leave, for influence in energy-rich Central Asia, and generally for support and backing at all major international fora. India needs Russia to realize its ambitions, global goals," Roy said.
No details were given as to the size of the potential aircraft deal between Russia and India, but both countries have in the past talked about producing 250-300 such fighters over 10 years, unofficially said to be worth about $35 billion.
"That in turn has enormously increased India's bargaining power with the U.S. and European suppliers of advanced conventional weapons," the Indian Express said.
Boeing's F/A-18 Super Hornet, France's Dassault Rafale, Lockheed Martin Corp's F-16, Russia's MiG-35, Sweden's Saab JAS-39 Gripen and the Eurofighter Typhoon are competing for a separate order from India for 126 fighter jets, valued at about $10.4 billion.
India and Russia agreed to open talks on building a third and fourth reactors for a nuclear power plant in India's southern state of Tamil Nadu, but failed to sign a firm deal because of Russian concerns over a recently passed liabilities bill.
(Additional reporting Krittivas Mukherjee; Editing by Robert Birsel)

description.hltext_display: Lohan 'assault' worker dismissed
description.content:
A woman who accused actress Lindsay Lohan of attacking her has been sacked by the Betty Ford rehab centre. Rehab centre spokesman Russ Patrick said the employee was dismissed for breaking patient confidentiality at the Palm Desert, California, clinic by giving interviews and "disclosing a privileged document". He said Dawn Holland's interview was a breach of trust and the rehabilitation process. "When patients come to the centre for treatment, they come to a safe place where their identity is protected, where anonymity is safeguarded," he said. Mean Girls star Lindsay, 24, is being investigated by Riverside County sheriff's detectives for misdemeanour battery following a confrontation on December 12.
A police spokeswoman said deputies were called to the Betty Ford centre shortly after 1am after an altercation between Lindsay and Ms Holland. Lindsay's lawyer said the actress called the police emergency number.
Neither Betty Ford nor sheriff's officials identified Ms Holland, but she appeared in an interview on celebrity website TMZ, claiming Lindsay and two other girls had sneaked out of the centre.
Ms Holland said she was trying to get Lindsay to submit to a breathalyser test when the actress became belligerent, pushed her and snatched a phone from her hand, straining her arm.
Riverside County sheriff's deputy Herlinda Valenzuela said Lindsay's case would be presented to prosecutors, who would decide whether she should be charged.

description.hltext_display: 关注：人大委员称醉驾入罪扩大打击面 对公务员不公">关注：人大委员称醉驾入罪扩大打击面 对公务员不公
description.content:
醉酒驾驶能否科学界定？如果一律以犯罪论处是否需要考虑情节？在全国人大常委会的审议中，委员对此有不同意见。有人认为，醉驾即入罪，而国家公职人员在犯罪后一般都会面临开除公职的处分，这样对公务员来说“后果很严重”。也有人认为，公职人员更应模范遵守法律。
观点一
醉驾入罪扩大打击面
李连宁委员赞成醉驾入罪，但建议慎重考虑是否不分任何情节的只要醉驾即入罪，他分析，目前不管是驾车刚刚启动就被制止住了也好，还是在道路上跑了很长时间，并造成交通拥堵，马上就定罪拘役，同时处以罚金。在对醉酒驾车入罪的问题，他建议在情节把握上更细化，建议加上“情节严重”，以免扩大打击面。
也有委员建议对醉驾入罪能否给予一定的过渡规定，目前醉驾即入罪，而国家公职人员在犯罪后一般都会面临开除公职的处分，后果很严重。
比如国务院2007年通过的行政机关公务员处分条例规定，行政机关公务员依法被判处刑罚的，给予开除处分。同时，国家公务员招考时，目前也规定曾因犯罪受过刑事处罚的不得报名。
观点二
公务员应率先垂范
郎胜委员对此认为，醉酒驾驶的行为本身是可以避免的，而国家公职人员更应模范遵守法律。全国人大法律委员会委员周光权接受采访时表示，此前法律委员会开会时，亦曾讨论过该问题，他认为，国家公职人员应率先垂范，其行为才有公信力，对他们的道义要求高于一般人是没有问题的。他并分析，中国目前处于社会转型期，而转型社会也意味着风险社会，运用刑罚手段对一些严重的突出的社会问题给予严厉的压制，也是可以接受的。
其他审议
全国人大常委会审议水土保持法草案
生产建设是否包括拍影视剧
水土保持法草案规定了生产建设活动造成水土流失应当治理，昨日，人大常委会审议水土保持法草案时提出疑问，生产建设活动是否包括影视剧拍摄？
生产建设活动在水土保持法草案中是个多处出现的概念，陈斯喜委员针对草案中“开办生产建设项目或者从事其他生产建设活动造成水土流失的，应当进行治理”指出，“生产建设活动”是否包括拍摄电影、电视，登山等活动？
陈斯喜表示，如果说“生产建设”已包括拍摄电影、电视等活动，目前的解释太随意，因为“生产建设”通常是指办企业、搞工程，很难与拍摄电影、电视相联系。他建议，如果该规定本意包括拍摄电影、电视等活动，把“其他生产建设活动”中的“生产建设”几个字去掉，改为“从事其他活动造成水土流失的”，可以包括得更宽一些，不要把“生产建设”这个词解释到其他方面去，“否则让人觉得法律词语想怎么解释就怎么解释，很不确定。”
观点
“醉驾状态很难判断”
丛斌委员表示，醉酒的状态到底怎样界定是一个科学问题，从医学角度来判定醉酒没醉酒很难。
身为病理学和法医学专家的丛斌说，每个人对酒精的耐受量不一样，有些人超过200毫克照样很清醒，也不是醉酒状态，而有人达到20毫克就不省人事。
他提了完善该规定的两个方式，一是单纯规定血液中的酒精含量超过多少毫克，用定量的方式确定犯罪主体。二是将醉酒改为酒后，只要饮酒后驾车上路，造成他人财产、人身损失的，就要承担刑事责任。

description.hltext_display: George Lucas et Disney condamnés en justice
description.content: Le ministère américain de la justice a annoncé avoir conclu un accord avec les studios Lucasfilm et Pixar obligeant les deux compagnies à rompre un pacte anti-concurrence qui empêchait leurs employés de pouvoir passer librement d'une société à l'autre. Lucasfilm, le studio de George Lucas (le père de "La Guerre des étoiles") et Pixar, la filiale de Disney ("Cars", "Le Monde de Nemo", "Toy Story") avaient conclu un pacte qui leur interdisait de débaucher leurs employés respectifs ou, à défaut, les obligeait à le faire d'un commun accord. Les employés concernés étaient essentiellement des animateurs."L'accord entre Lucasfilm et Pixar était un obstacle à la concurrence pour les animateurs numériques sans aucune justification", a estimé dans un communiqué Christine Varney, procureur-adjointe, chargée de la division anti-monopole du ministère de la Justice. Le ministère a déposé une plainte formelle contre Lucasfilm mardi -- Pixar était déjà poursuivi depuis septembre --, mais le même jour les deux studios ont présenté un nouvel accord qui annule les dispositions du pacte antérieur, précise le communiqué du ministère.

description.hltext_display: WRAPUP 2-Europe travel chaos eases but pain remains
description.content:
Page 1 of 4 | Next Page
By Michael Roddy LONDON, Dec 22 (Reuters) - Airline and international train services were limping back towards normal in parts of Europe on Wednesday, but the lingering effects of ice and snow that caused widespread chaos still weighed on schedules. The disruptions to airlines and high-speed trains in continental Europe, and linking Britain to the continent, created travel chaos for tens of thousands of travellers in the busy Christmas period following heavy weekend snowfalls. They also brought calls for legislation to force airports to deal more effectively with snow and other bad weather. European Union transport chief Siim Kallas said he was considering forcing airports to provide a minimum level of infrastructure support during severe weather. London's Heathrow, the world's busiest international airport, and Frankfurt Airport, the biggest on the continent, said on their websites that operations were returning to normal after severe disruptions. Wolfgang Prock-Schauer, chief executive of airline BMI, owned by Lufthansa, accused BAA of being unprepared for the heavy snow at Heathrow. "What is really incredible is that 10 cm (4 ins) of snow closed the airport down for two days and then it operated at one-third capacity," he told the Times newspaper. "BAA was not pre

description.hltext_display: India reports successful missile test
description.content:
India successfully tested a short-range, nuclear-capable missile with a range of 350km today, an official said.
The army twice fired the surface-to-surface missile Prithvi II from a range in Chandipur in the eastern state of Orissa, said SP Dash, a senior official at the range. ?The test was successful,? the official said. The missile, which would target mainly military installations, can carry a warhead weighing up to 500kg, he said.
It has already been tested more than half a dozen times. However, a test of the same missile three months ago failed due to technical problems.
India and long-time rival Pakistan routinely test-fire missiles, and usually notify each other ahead of the launches.
New Delhi has said it developed its current crop of missiles - including the short-range Prithvi, the anti-tank Nag and the supersonic BrahMos - as a deterrent against neighbours China and Pakistan. India?s Agni-II missile, with a range of up to 2,000km, can put areas of southern China within striking distance. And the Agni-III, successfully tested last year, can carry nuclear warheads across much of Asia and the Middle East. AP

description.hltext_display: Spectacle: Spiderman chute de 9 mètres à Broadway
description.content:
C'est une chute spectaculaire de plus de 9 mètres à laquelle ont assisté les spectateurs de la comédie musicale Spiderman à Broadway.
Lundi soir, à New York, en pleines répétitions publiques de la comédie musicale « Spiderman: Turn Off the Dark », un acteur a fait une chute de plusieurs mètres.
Le comédien est tombé du haut dune plate-forme et sest sérieusement blessé quelques minutes avant la fin du spectacle. Il est depuis à l'hôpital et aurait plusieurs côtes cassées.
La première de « Spiderman » déjà décalée plusieurs fois à cause dautres accidents, a été repoussée au 7 février.
L'accident a été filmé par des spectateurs...
Regardez

description.hltext_display: El día que la sociedad española e Internet se hicieron oír
description.content:
Foto: HAWKEN KING/FLICKR/CC Ampliar foto
MADRID, 22 Dic. (Carlos Hergueta/Portaltic) -
Hace solo una semana, el 15 de diciembre, Red Sostenible enviaba un comunicado para denunciar que el Gobierno planeaba acelerar la aprobación de la disposición final segunda de la Ley de Economía Sostenible, llamada popularmente 'Ley Sinde', mediante el mecanismo conocido como "competencia legislativa plena".
La Comisión de Economía y Hacienda, compuesta por unos pocos diputados, iba a aprobar una ley que permitiría al Gobierno cerrar páginas web, presuntamente siempre con el argumento de que vulneraran derechos de autor. Saltaron las alarmas.
Al día siguiente, 16 de diciembre, la Asociación de Internautas se sumaba a denunciar este "atropello inadmisible" y facilitaba los datos de los diputados que iban a participar en la votación para que los ciudadanos expresaran sus quejas. Enrique Dans hacía lo propio con los correos en su popular blog.
Desde entonces comenzó una carrera de denuncias en la Red. Los diputados recibían llamadas y correos, los foros bullían, las redes sociales veían nacer grupos de protesta y los 'hashtags' de Twitter hacían referencia a la 'Ley Sinde' y su aprobación el martes 21 de diciembre. También se convocaron movilizaciones en el "mundo real".
Supuestamente cuando saltó la liebre, el PSOE contaba con PNV y CC y estaba a punto de conseguir el apoyo de CiU. La 'Ley Sinde' iba a salir adelante. Sin embargo, en una jornada intensa e histórica como la de ayer, 21 de diciembre, las cosas cambiaron. A lo largo del día el apoyo de los grupos se fue difuminando y la votación se fue prorrogando.
La votación de la 'Ley Sinde' fue desplazada hasta el final del pleno del Congreso y los usuarios la seguían con fervor. Twitter se convirtió en un auténtico hervidero en el que internautas de a pie y periodistas narraban la votación en tiempo real con una intensidad apabullante. Un servidor pensó que habría suicidios en masa cuando la señal del canal del Congreso se perdió momentáneamente.
Y finalmente el resultado fue el que conocemos hoy. El PSOE no consiguió el apoyo suficiente para sacar adelante la ley e Internet, especialmente Twitter, explotaba entre vítores, felicitaciones y bromas sobre las críticas de Miguel Bosé y Alejandro Sanz a los políticos. Pululaba también el 'hashtag' #sindedimision. Los internautas se habían hecho oír.
El siguiente paso para la Ley de Economía Sostenible (LES) será su debate en el Senado a partir del 18 de enero y allí el PSOE, si quiere insistir en la comisión de propiedad intelectual que creaba la 'ley Sinde' con competencias para solicitar el cierre de páginas web, tendrá que presentarlo de nuevo como enmienda y buscar aliados, con la diferencia de que en la Cámara Alta no es el partido mayoritario.
Puede que hayas permanecido al margen de todo este proceso y que hayas sido mero espectador. Puede que no hayas alzado tu voz o incluso puede que ni siquiera estés muy al tanto de lo que se votó ayer. También puede que lo único que te interese sea poder seguir viendo películas pirateadas que dañan a la industria del entretenimiento. Pero la verdad es que la sociedad civil se apuntó un tanto anoche gracias a Internet y la libertad que representa.
Si piensas que aquellos que utilizan Twitter, crean blogs, votan y leen en comunidades de noticias, o las asociaciones de internautas no son más que unos frikis, amigo mío, no puede estar más perdido y equivocado. Gracias a gente como ellos, como tú mismo, hoy España es un poco más democrática. Dales, date, un aplauso.

description.hltext_display: N.Y. sues Lehman auditors
description.content:
Attorney General Andrew Cuomo said that in the seven years leading up to the bank�s collapse, Ernst & Young signed off on an accounting practice that allowed Lehman to keep billions of dollars in debt off its financial statements.
In the suit, lawyers for the state argued that in essence, Ernst & Young auditors had allowed the bank �to engage in a massive accounting fraud, involving the surreptitious removal of tens of billions of dollars of securities from Lehman�s balance sheet in order to create a false impression of Lehman�s liquidity, thereby defrauding the investing public.� Ernst & Young issued a statement late Tuesday saying it planned to �vigorously defend against the civil claims.� �There is no factual or legal basis for a claim to be brought against an auditor in this context where the accounting for the underlying transaction is in accordance with the Generally Accepted Accounting Principles,� the statement said. �Lehman�s audited financial statements clearly portrayed Lehman as a highly leveraged entity operating in a risky and volatile industry.� The suit takes aim at Lehman�s practice of temporarily moving liquid, fixed-income securities to European banks in exchange for cash that it used to pay off liabilities.
According to the suit, those transfers, called �Repo 105� transactions, were booked as sales of assets, but were actually loans because Lehman�s deals with the banks required them to repurchase those securities right away, usually within a few days. �Rather than expose this fraud as auditors must, Ernst & Young expressly �approved� this practice in 2001,� Cuomo�s lawsuit said. As much as $50 billion in Lehman assets were shuffled in the transactions, the lawsuit said.
The suit seeks to force Ernst & Young to return the $150 million in fees it charged Lehman for its audits.

event_or_fact.property: in the seven years leading up to the bank?s collapse, Ernst&Young signed off on an accounting practice that allowed Lehman to keep billions of dollars in debt off its financial statements.

description.hltext_display: USA belangen Deutsche Bank für Steuersparmodelle
description.content:
New York (dpa) - Die USA haben die Deutsche Bank für ihre Beteiligung an illegalen Steuersparmodellen zur Rechenschaft gezogen. Das Frankfurter Geldhaus willigte ein, rund eine halbe Milliarde Dollar an den amerikanischen Fiskus zu zahlen. Im Gegenzug würde der Fall nicht weiter verfolgt, teilte die US- Bundesstaatsanwaltschaft mit. Die Fälle liegen nach Angaben der Deutschen Bank allerdings schon Jahre zurück - von 1996 bis 2002.
Artikel vom 22.12.2010

description.hltext_display: 'Topmensen Schiphol sjoemelen voor hogere bonus'
description.content: AMSTERDAM - Topmensen van Schiphol hebben met de jaarcijfers gesjoemeld om hogere bonussen te vangen. Dat zegt Pieter Lakeman vanochtend in De Pers. Hij kreeg vorig jaar landelijke bekendheid door zijn oproep aan rekeninghouders van de DSB Bank om hun geld daar weg te halen. Pieter Lakeman. Verschillende medewerkers van Schiphol zouden hem hebben gevraagd onderzoek te doen naar mogelijk wanbeleid bij de luchthaven. Voor hij begint, krijgt het bestuur zelf gelegenheid de 'misstanden' aan te pakken, zegt Lakeman in de krant.� Daarom heeft hij een brief gestuurd naar bestuursvoorzitter Jos Nijhuis. "Ik heb ze twee weken de tijd gegeven om te reageren." De reden voor het onderzoek zou het 'algemeen belang' zijn. Lakeman is aandeelhouder van een bedrijf dat zaken heeft gedaan met Schiphol. Hij stelt dat hij zijn zaken met Schiphol niet zijn 'primaire drijfveer' zijn om achter de luchthaven aan te gaan.� Vooral financieel directeur Pieter Verboom zou de jaarwinst zo hebben gemanipuleerd dat hij een hogere bonus krijgt. Er zou zijn gesjoemeld met opleverdata van vastgoedprojecten. Ook zou Verboom opdracht hebben gegeven rendementscijfers te vervalsen.� Dit gebeurde volgens Lakeman om projecten goedgekeurd te krijgen die eigenlijk niet aantrekkelijk waren voor Schiphol. In ruil hiervoor zou Verboom van de wederpartij een Frans huisje hebben gekregen. Hierover zou Verboom zijn gehoord door de raad van commissarissen, maar die ontsloeg hem niet.� Lakeman rekent er volgens de krant niet op dat inderdaad een intern onderzoek wordt opgestart. "Als ze er niets mee doen, ga ik zelf aan de slag." Hiervoor gaat hij jaarverslagen en het kadaster doorpluizen. "Ik kan natuurlijk altijd nog getuigen laten horen, als ik toch nog een rechtszaak tegen Schiphol begin." (Novum/CBR)

description.hltext_display: [AsiaNet]�ø��� C �ڱ����޿��� 1�� �޷��� ������ Elevance Renewable Sciences
description.content:
Elevance Renewable Sciences, Inc.가 시리즈 C 자금조달 라운드에서 1억 달러를 조달했다고 오늘 발표했다. Elevance는 재생가능한 원료에서 개인 관리 제품, 세제, 윤활제 및 그 외 다른 전문 화학물질과 연료 시장에서 사용되는 고기능성 성분을 제조하는 업체이다. Naxos Capital Partners가 TPG Biotech 및 TPG Growth와 함께 Total Energy Ventures International이 포함된 새로운 투자자들로 이번 라운드를 지휘했다.
이번 투자는 아시아와 북미 및 남미에서 사업 확장 및 바이오 정유공장 설립을 비롯하여 Elevance의 지속적인 성장을 지원하게 된다.
Elevance의 K’Lynne Johnson 최고경영자(CEO)는 “우리 Elevance는 우리 제품 및 기술의 상업화가 빠른 속도로 진전되어 기쁘기 그지 없습니다. 이번 자금조달 라운드는 세계적인 규모의 고품질, 고기능성 재생가능 화학물질 제조 부문에 있어 우리의 지속적인 성장과 혁신을 지원하게 됩니다. Naxos Capital Partners와 Total Energy Ventures International이 투자자로 참여하게 되어 기존 투자자들의 역량이 강화되는 것은 물론, 국제적 확장이라는 우리 목표에 한 걸음 더 다가서게 되었습니다.”라고 말했다.
Elevance는 2007년 TPG, Cargill 및 Materia이 투자한 4천만 달러가 넘는 자본 및 기술로 설립되었다. 2010년 Elevance는 인도네시아에 세계 최대의 바이오 정유공장을 설립하기 위해 Wilmar International와 공동으로 합작투자회사를 설립했으며, 특이한 계면활성제 및 항균물질을 상업화하기 위해서 Stepan Company와 공동 개발 계약서를 체결했다. Wilmar International과 Stepan Company 외에 Elevance의 전략적 파트너로는 Cargill Inc., Dow Corning Corporation, Trent University, Tetramer Technologies, United Soybean Board 및 SaskCanola 등이 있다.
Elevance Renewable Sciences, Inc. 소개
일리노이주 볼링브룩에 위치한 Elevance Renewable Sciences, Inc.는 천연 오일로 귀중한 전문 화학물질을 만드는 업체이다. Elevance는 노벨상을 수상한 올레핀 복분해라는 기술을 이용하여 개인 관리 제품, 세제, 연료, 윤활제 및 그 외 다른 전문 화학물질 시장에서 사용되는 고기능성 성분을 제조한다. Elevance에 관한 추가 정보는 www.elevance.com을 참조한다.
Naxos Capital Partners 소개
NAXOS Capital Partners는 독특한 지적재산이나 시장 위치를 가진 사업체를 인수 및 발전시키는데 초점을 두는 룩셈부르크의 프라이버트 에쿼티 그룹이다. NAXOS 팀은 농업 및 식품 사업, 에너지 및 클린 기술을 포함하여 지금까지 성적이 좋은 분야에 집중적으로 투자한다. NAXOS는 직접 참여하는 적극적인 소유를 통해 자사의 포트폴리오 기업 및 투자자들을 위해 장기적이며 지속가능한 가치를 창출하는데 전념한다.
Total Energy Ventures 소개
Total Energy Ventures는 프랑스의 석유 및 가스 대기업인 Total의 벤처 캐피탈이다. Total Energy Ventures의 투자는 대안 및 재생가능한 에너지, 효율적인 에너지 및 천연 자원 이용, 폐기물 관리 및 온실가스 축소 등 에너지 전환 문제를 해결하는데 도움이 되는 분야에서 혁신적인 기술과 사업 모델을 지닌 기업 개발을 지원한다. Total Energy Ventures는 주로 사업 개발에 필요한 자금을 조달하기 위한 증자 과정에 있는 특정 기업의 소수지분에 투자한다.
Total은 세계 최대의 석유 및 가스 그룹 중 하나로서 130개가 넘는 국가에서 활동을 하고 있다. 96,000명에 달하는 Total 직원들은 업계의 모든 부문(석유 및 천연가스 탐사와 생산, 정유 및 마케팅, 가스 및 전력 그리고 거래)에서 자신의 전문지식을 활용하고 있다. Total은 오늘은 물론 내일도 전 세계에 에너지를 공급하기 위해서 일하고 있다. Total은 또한 화학물질 분야에서도 최고의 기업이다.
TPG Biotech 소개
TPG Biotech는 국제적인 사적 투자 회사인 TPG의 성장 자본 및 벤처 투자 플랫폼의 일환으로서, 제약적 발견과 개발, 의학 기술, 진단법, 건강관리 및 제약 서비스, 생명 과학은 물론 생명공학의 산업 적용 등에 집중적으로 투자한다. TPG Biotech는 TPG의 더욱 광범위한 자원을 활용할 수 있는 접근성을 가지고 있다. TPG Biotech에 관한 추가 정보는 www.tpgbiotech.com을 참조한다.
TPG Growth 소개
TPG Growth는 국제적인 사적 투자 회사인 TPG의 중간시장 및 성장 자본 투자 플랫폼으로서, 인수금융, 성장 자본 및 상장기업 사모투자(private investment in public equity, PIPE) 구조를 이용하여 광범위한 산업 및 지역에 집중적인 투자를 한다. TPG Growth는 미국, 캐나다 및 인도에 지사가 있다.

Elevance Renewable Sciences Raises $100 Million in Series C Financing
AsiaNet 42670
(BOLINGBROOK, Ill., Dec. 22, 2010 AsiaNet=연합뉴스) Elevance Renewable Sciences, Inc. announced today that it has raised $100 million in its Series C financing round. Elevance produces high performance ingredients for use in personal care products, detergents, lubricants and other specialty chemicals and fuel markets from renewable feedstocks. Naxos Capital Partners led the round with additional new investors, including Total Energy Ventures International, joining TPG Biotech and TPG Growth in the financing.
The investment will support Elevance's continued growth, including expansion and creation of biorefineries in Asia, North and South America.
"Elevance is pleased with our rapid progress commercializing our products and technology," said K'Lynne Johnson, CEO of Elevance. "This round of financing supports our company's continued growth and innovation in making quality, high-performing renewable chemicals available on a world scale basis. The addition of Naxos Capital Partners and Total Energy Ventures International builds on the strength of our existing investors, and is an important step forward in achieving our goal of global expansion."
Elevance was formed in 2007, with more than $40 million in capital and technology invested by TPG, Cargill and Materia. Major developments from Elevance in 2010 include a joint venture with Wilmar International to build the world's largest biorefinery in Indonesia, and a joint development agreement with Stepan Company to commercialize novel surfactants and antimicrobials. In addition to Wilmar International and Stepan Company, Elevance counts Cargill Inc., Dow Corning Corporation, Trent University, Tetramer Technologies, United Soybean Board and SaskCanola among its strategic partners.
About Elevance Renewable Sciences, Inc.
Based in Bolingbrook, Ill., Elevance Renewable Sciences, Inc. creates valued specialty chemicals from natural oils. Using a Nobel Prize-winning technology called olefin metathesis, the company creates high performance ingredients for use in personal care products, detergents, fuels, lubricants and other specialty chemicals markets. To learn more about Elevance, visit www.elevance.com
About Naxos Capital Partners
NAXOS Capital Partners is a Luxembourg based private equity group focused on acquiring and developing businesses with unique intellectual property or market positions. The NAXOS team is focusing on investments in areas where they have a successful track record including agro and food business, energy and clean-technology. Through active, hands-on ownership, NAXOS is committed to creating long-term sustainable value for its portfolio companies and investors.
About Total Energy Ventures
Total Energy Ventures is the venture capital arm of French oil & gas major Total. Its investments support the development of companies with innovative technologies and business models in areas such as alternative and renewable energies, efficient use of energy and natural resources, waste management and greenhouse gas reduction, etc. that will help meet the challenges of the energy transition. The investments primarily consist of acquiring minority interests in selected companies during capital increases to help finance their development.
Total is one of the world's major oil and gas groups, with activities in more than 130 countries. Its 96,000 employees put their expertise to work in every part of the industry - exploration and production of oil and natural gas, refining and marketing, gas & power and trading. Total is working to keep the world supplied with energy, both today and tomorrow. The Group is also a first rank player in chemicals.
About TPG Biotech
TPG Biotech is part of the growth equity and venture investment platform of TPG, the global private investment firm. TPG Biotech targets investments in pharmaceutical discovery and development, medical technology, diagnostics, healthcare and pharmaceutical services, life sciences, as well as industrial applications of biotechnology. TPG Biotech has access to the broader resources of TPG. Please visit www.tpgbiotech.com.
About TPG Growth
TPG Growth is the middle market and growth equity investment platform of TPG, the global private investment firm. TPG Growth targets investments in a broad range of industries and geographies, utilizing leveraged buyout, growth equity, and private investment in public equity (PIPE) structures. TPG Growth has offices in the United States, China and India.

description.hltext_display: 조광래 감독 "손흥민 아시안컵 데려가겠다"
description.content: 점검은 끝났다. 독일 분데스리가에서 돌풍을 일으키고 있는 '슈퍼 신인' 손흥민(18, 함부르크)이 조광래호에서 훈련한 시간은 이틀. 23일 오전 한 차례의 개인훈련만을 남겨둔 가운데 조광래 감독은 22일 제주월드컵경기장에서 실시한 자체 연습경기를 통해 손흥민에 대한 평가를 마쳤다. 결론은 합격점이다.이날 손흥민은 전반에 오른쪽 측면 공격수로, 후반에 왼쪽 측면 공격수로 뛰었다. 골은 넣지 못했지만 감각적인 움직임으로 조광래 감독의 시선을 붙잡는데 성공했다. 조 감독은 경기 후 인터뷰에서 "오늘 플레이 봐서는 아시안컵에 기용할 가능성이 상당히 높다"면서 "코치들과 의논해야 겠지만 기대보다 좋은 플레이를 했다"며 만족감을 표했다.이어 조 감독은 "공격적인 측면에서 상당히 날카롭다"면서 "해외파들이 가세해 빠른 패스가 이뤄지면 날카로운 공격 장면들을 만들 수 있을 것이다. 아시안컵에 기용했으면 한다"며 손흥민의 아시안컵 합류를 기정 사실화했다. ◇손흥민, 조광래 감독에게 매력적이었던 이유손흥민은 만 18살이다. 아시안컵 예비엔트리 47명 가운데 가장 어리다. 경험도 적다. 이제 겨우 분데스리가에서 7경기를 뛰었을 뿐이다. 아직은 ‘즉시전력감’으로 확신할 수 없는 손흥민이었다. 그럼에도 불구하고 조광래 감독이 일정 맞추기도 쉽지 않았던 손흥민을 제주로 불러들인 이유는 손흥민의 공격 스타일에 있다.조 감독은 손흥민의 공격스타일에 대해 “대담하고 과감하다”고 표현하고 있다. “우리 공격수들은 너무 안전한 움직임을 하는 것이 문제”라는 조 감독은 슈팅 사전거리에 들어섰을 때 슈팅을 생각하기보다 패스할 곳을 찾는 소극적인 공격수들과는 달리 “틈만 나면 (슈팅)때릴 생각을 하는” 손흥민의 플레이 스타일에 큰 점수를 주고 있다. 또한 빠른 템포의 분데스리가에서 90분 풀타임 무리없이 소화해낸다는 점도 ‘빠른 템포의 경기 운영’에 포커스를 맞추고 있는 조광래 감독의 코드와 맞아 떨어지고 있다. 조 감독은 이런 손홍민을 “파닥파닥하다”며 그의 역동성을 흡족해 했다.이 같은 손흥민의 모습에 조광래 감독은 일찌감치 손흥민을 직접 불러 보고 싶은 욕심을 감추지 않았다. 그러나 소속팀 일정으로 인해 손흥민은 21일에야 팀훈련에 참가했고 이틀간 조광래 감독 앞에서 부지런히 뛰어다녔다.조광래 감독은 21일 훈련을 마친 뒤 “컨디션 회복도 안된 상황에서 무슨 말을 하겠냐. 내일 오후 연습경기를 해봐야 할 것 같다”며 손흥민에 대한 평가를 유보하면서도 “생각보다 볼 다루는 감각이 있다”며 미소를 지었다. 22일 연습경기에 나선 손흥민은 기대하던 골은 넣지 못했지만 좌우를 가리지 않는 부지런한 움직임, 그리고 감각적인 볼 트래핑 능력, 적절한 패스 타이밍을 보여주는데 성공하며 결국 조 감독의 마음을 사로잡았다.

description.hltext_display: Flop d'audience pour le nouveau magazine de TF1
description.content:
Julien Arnaud présentait sur TF1, dès 22h45, "Près de chez vous". Ce nouveau numéro n'a pas séduit les téléspectateurs.
Seulement 1.354.000 téléspectateurs étaient au rendez-vous, soit 11.8% de PDM.
Le premier numéro de "Près de chez vous" avait attiré 1.800.000 téléspectateurs soit 18%.

description.hltext_display: BHP pushes Aust shares up, offsets banks
description.author: Rebecca Le May
description.content:
The Australian share market closed marginally higher on low trading volumes after gains by mining giant BHP Billiton offset weaker performances by the banks.
The benchmark S&P/ASX200 index was up 6.5 points, or 0.14 per cent, at 4,778.4 points, while the broader All Ordinaries index lifted 7.1 points, or 0.15 per cent, to 4,869.6 points.
On the ASX 24, the March share price index futures contract was three points higher at 4,769 points, with 13,865 contracts traded.
Austock Securities senior client adviser Michael Heffernan said the modest lift on the Australian bourse was a solid result but slightly disappointing given the positive US lead and rise in most commodities prices.
"We haven't done too badly," Mr Heffernan said.
"The turnover is light and is pretty much line ball with this time last year."
National turnover was 1.95 billion shares worth $3.56 billion.
Mr Heffernan said BHP Billiton kept the market's head above water, offsetting weaker performances by the banks.
BHP Billiton was up 40 cents, or 0.88 per cent, at $45.82 while Rio Tinto put on eight cents to $86.78.
Westpac was down 10 cents at $22.61, ANZ fell seven cents to $23.63, National Australia Bank was 16 cents cheaper at $24.05 and Commonwealth Bank backtracked 13 cents to $50.87.
The corporate regulator said it had begun legal proceedings against Commonwealth Bank, Bank of Queensland and Macquarie Group over the collapse of Storm Financial.
Shares in Macquarie Group were up 22 cents at $37.22 while Bank of Queensland shares inched one cent higher to $10.54.
In other headlines on Wednesday, Telstra said its negotiations on the national broadband network with the federal government would take longer than it previously expected.
Shares in the telco were steady at $2.77.
Fashion retailer Noni B said it expected net profit for the first half of 2010/11 to be down from the prior corresponding period after like-for-like store sales fell 2.5 per cent.
Noni B shares shed seven cents, or 6.14 per cent, to $1.07.
Among other retail stocks, Woolworths put on nine cents to $26.80, Coles owner Wesfarmers gained 16 cents to $32.18 and JB Hi-Fi eased four cents to $17.85.
In the energy sector, Woodside was four cents softer at $42.78 and Santos gave up six cents to $13.56.
The spot price of gold in Sydney was $US1,389.48 per fine ounce, up $US3.25 from Tuesday's local close of $US1,386.23 per fine ounce.
Gold producer Newcrest was 11 cents weaker at $40.23.
The best performing stock in the S&P/ASX 100 index was rare earths explorer Lynas Corporation after it said it had received approval from the Malawi government to acquire a rare earths resource for $US4 million ($A4.02 million).
Lynas shares finished up seven cents, or 4.4 per cent, at $1.66.
The worst performing stock on the S&P/ASX 100 index was online job ads company Seek, down 20 cents, or 2.96 per cent, at $6.56.
The top traded stock by volume was iron ore explorer Sundance Resources with 53.58 million shares worth $26.54 million changing hands.
Sundance shares firmed one cent, or 2.06 per cent, to 49.5 cents.
There were 609 stocks up, 521 down and 379 unchanged.

description.hltext_display: Deutsche Bank muss Millionen zahlen
description.content:
New York/Frankfurt (dpa) - Die USA haben die Deutsche Bank für ihre Beteiligung an illegalen Steuersparmodellen zur Rechenschaft gezogen. Das Frankfurter Geldhaus willigte ein, knapp 554 Millionen Dollar an den amerikanischen Fiskus zu zahlen.
Im Gegenzug würde der Fall nicht weiter verfolgt, teilte die US-Bundesstaatsanwaltschaft in Manhattan am Dienstag mit. Die Deutsche Bank habe kriminelles Fehlverhalten eingestanden, hieß es in der gemeinsamen Mitteilung der Staatsanwaltschaft und der Steuerbehörde IRS. Die illegalen Steuersparmodelle für Kunden, in die das Kreditinstitut verwickelt gewesen sei, hätten zu milliardenschweren Ausfällen für den Staat beigetragen.
Die Fälle liegen nach Angaben der Deutschen Bank allerdings schon Jahre zurück - von 1996 bis 2002. Die Bank habe ihre Richtlinien und Verfahren seitdem wesentlich verschärft, teilte das Kreditinstitut mit. Im Rahmen der sogenannten Nichtverfolgungsvereinbarung muss sie ihre internen Mechanismen weiter verfeinern.
Ein unabhängiger Experte überwacht, dass sich die Deutsche Bank nichts mehr zuschulden kommen lässt. Zudem muss die Bank von Zeit zu Zeit Bericht an die US-Behörden erstatten. Steuersparmodelle, die den kritisierten ähnlich sind, sind für die Frankfurter künftig komplett tabu.
Finanziell hat die Deutsche Bank vorgesorgt. Sie bildete nach eigenen Angaben in der Vergangenheit ausreichende Rückstellungen, "so dass der zu zahlende Betrag keine Auswirkungen auf das laufende Ergebnis nach Steuern haben wird". Immer wieder hatte die Deutsche Bank in ihren Finanzberichten vage auf Steuerermittlungsverfahren in den USA hingewiesen.

description.hltext_display: Holmen Signs Electricity Supply Agreement with Vattenfall
description.content:
“and we are pleased to be able to extend our close, long-standing relationship with Vattenfall.”
Holmen (STO:HOLMA)(STO:HOLMB) has reached a new long-term electricity supply agreement with Vattenfall. The agreement means that Holmen will purchase some 0.9 TWh of electricity per year from Vattenfall - almost a third of the purchased electricity that Holmen needs - for a six-year period beginning in 2016.
Around one-third of the electricity Holmen requires comes from its own production at wholly or part-owned hydro power stations and back pressure power production at its mills. In 2009, the Group’s total electricity consumption in Sweden amounted to some 3.9 TWh.
“This is an important agreement for Holmen, which is active in a world with great uncertainty regarding the supply of electricity in the future,” comments Magnus Hall, Holmen’s President and CEO, “and we are pleased to be able to extend our close, long-standing relationship with Vattenfall.”
“The long-term supply and efficient use of electricity are important factors for our customers in primary industries. We are therefore very pleased that Holmen has displayed continued confidence in our relationship,” says Torbjörn Wahlborg, head of Vattenfall Nordic.
___________________________________________________________________________
In its capacity as issuer, Holmen AB is releasing the information in this press release in accordance with Chapter 17 of the Swedish Securities Market Act (2007:528). The information was distributed to the media for publication at 08.30 CET on Wednesday 22 December 2010.
This information was brought to you by Cision http://www.cisionwire.com

description.hltext_display: 여수박람회 예산 확보 촉구 상경투쟁
description.content: 여수세계박람회 예산 미편성에 항의하는 여수시민들이 22일 청와대와 국회, 정부청사 앞 등에서 시위를 벌이고 긴급 편성을 촉구했다.국회와 세종로 정부청사, 청와대 앞에서 여수박람회 예산 미편성에 항의하는 여수시민들의 분노 목소리가 울려 퍼졌다.여수지역 89개 시민사회단체들로 구성된 여수시민비상대책회의는 오는 시민 120여 명과 재경 향우회 30여 명 등 모두 150여 명이 참여한 가운데 상경 투쟁을 벌였다.참석자들은 피켓을 들고 "여수세계박람회가 여수지역만의 행사가 아닌 우리나라가 세계와 한 약속인데도 정부가 관련 예산 확보에 소극적인 태도를 보이면서 불과 일년 반 정도를 앞두고 국제적인 망신을 살 우려에 처해 있다"고 밝혔다.참석자들은 내년 2월 추경에도 필요한 예산을 충분히 반영하지 않으면 박람회 보이콧 운동을 전개할 것이라며 이명박 대통령의 결단을 촉구했다.참석자들은 한나라당과 국무총리실, 특임장관실 관계자 등을 만나 항의 서한과 함께 여수시민들의 분노의 목소리를 전달했다.한편 국회 시위 현장에 함께한 주승용 의원은 "여수지역 국회의원들이 대통령 면담을 요청했고, 면담이 성사되면 특단의 대책을 요구해 내년 2월 추경에서 예산이 반영되도록 할 것"이라고 밝혔다.상경투쟁을 마친 대책회의는 앞으로 시민 만 명 서명 운동과 투쟁기금 모금 운동을 지속적으로 전개하고, 대통령 면담 성사 등 추이를 지켜본 뒤 충분한 변화가 없으면 다시 상경투쟁을 벌이는 등 투쟁 수위를 높여간다는 계획이다.

description.hltext_display: How to Find a Board Certified Plastic Surgeon That is Brilliant at Cosmetic Facial Surgery
description.content:
Edit Article | Posted: Dec 21, 2010 |Comments: 0 |
Share
Cosmetic surgery doctors all over the United States combined perform 1000's of operations annually. Most patients have great results and very few abnormalities when they are able to get the right cosmetic facial surgery performed. To find a board certified plastic surgeon that is keen at the whatever you want done is the most of substance determination that you will have to make. As far as cosmetic surgery cost, a lower cost should not be the most critical judgment consideration, especially if you want a guarantee about quality. Take time beforehand to analyze and plan skillfully, this will ensure your surgery goes as planned and that your recovery will be speedy. If you do not take the time to analyze the various details ahead of time, you could possibly end up with disgusting results and a prolonged recovery.
Your plastic surgeon should be accepted by the American Board of Plastic Surgery. This authentication is to disclose that they have received expert training. To be certified, a surgeon is required to have at minimum 3 years of training in general surgery in an ACGME-accredited residency program. They must also have completed at least two years of training in plastic surgery in an ACGME-accredited residency program. Part of holding acknowledgment is aptitude in continuing education programs. Check the credentials of any surgeon you are interested in. Make sure that the institution the surgeon attended is also accredited. You must also remeber to also examine the anesthesiologist, be sure he/she is also accredited. Checking out these aspects are what you are responsible for, doing your homework will ensure that you get through the procedures. This will also decrease the grief of defects.
It's important to make certain your cosmetic surgeon has the exact experience he/she admits. You can also discover at the ABPS if they have practiced as long as they claim. You should be sure you are content with your surgeon, since you will be putting your life and body in their hands. Having a complete understanding with the surgeon that is going to be performing plastic surgery on you is a must. Tell the surgeon how you want it done, and ask him or her how many times they have performed it. Ask if there were anomalies, and how were they able to handle them? All physicians should be ready to discuss with you any questions you have in order to make you feel more easygoing. They should also be able to provide before and after photos. Ask for references of previous clients. If a physician does not want to to give any of this information , it's best that you proceed to find a new surgeon.
For the best results with your plastic surgery, you should take the time to find a plastic surgery doctor that's ideal for your situation. This task will be rewarded in the quality of the surgery and your great results. In addition, pay a little more for the best plastic surgeons, because you uaually get what you pay for. If you opt for higher quality work, your results will be more long-term and more normal in appearance. If you do not do your due diligence during your search, then this could lead to a lame surgery. The blame will be on your head in that case. A versed patient will make informed choices, these are some of the best kind of patients.

한국신문윤리위원회(이사장 김대성)는 22일 오후 태평로 프레스센터에서 임시총회 및 이사회를 열어 내년부터 시행하게 될 인터넷신문 심의사업을 위해 정관 일부 개정안을 의결했다고 밝혔다. 신문윤리위는 인터넷신문 심의를 위해 인터넷신문협회와의 협의를 거쳤으며, 내년부터 이들 회원사를 대상으로 자율규제 대상 범위를 확대한다.
새 심의실장으로는 최영주 심의위원이 선임됐다.

description.hltext_display: Karkwa, une année sur «Les chemins de verre»
Pakistan domestic players ask for regional contracts
description.content:
Pakistan's domestic players who are currently representing city cricket associations in the Quaid-e-Azam Trophy have asked the Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) to resume the regional central contracts system, in order to ensure their livelihood through the off-season.
This year's QEA Trophy features 22 teams - 13 departmental and nine regional - divided into two leagues. During former PCB chairman Nasim Ahsraf's reign, players in the regional sides were given central contracts, a practice that has been done away with in recent years, along with a reduction in the match fees.
"The top players from the associations leave their regional sides in order to play for departments so how can you expect the regions to maintain their level of performances every year?" asked a president of one of the leading associations. "The standard of associations can only be gauged if there are different leagues for associations and departments. You cannot expect a region to defeat departmental sides in every match. There is a big difference of quality."
The earlier contracts system had three categories, with the top level getting Rs 20,000 ($ 233) per month, and the next grades earning Rs 15,000 and Rs 10,000 respectively. The monetary motivation, according to Karachi Blues player Tabish Nawab, encouraged players to pursue cricket in Pakistan instead of looking for more lucrative options abroad.
"There has been a trend in Pakistan that most of our cricketers aim to play just five matches anyhow, in order to be eligible to play in Britain," Nawab told the
"While the players are abroad they have to do job five days a week, and the remaining two days they have to play for their respective clubs. Thus their fitness level does not remain the same and players get injured. Cricket has become a profession and the board needs to understand that there is a dire need to invest in the game for domestic players as well. In today's world money has become a necessity. In such lowly pay structure, you cannot expect that a player can have top quality cricket gear, a healthy diet to maintain his fitness at the same time. We need to end the financial uncertainty surrounding our players so that they only think about cricket which will eventually help Pakistan."

event_or_fact.property: There has been a trend in Pakistan that most of our cricketers aim to play just five matches anyhow, in order to be eligible to play in Britain

description.hltext_display: 현대그룹 "佛나티시스은행 대출금은 브릿지론"
description.content: 현대그룹이 현대건설 인수를 위해 프랑스 나티시스은행에서 대출받은 1조 2천억 원은 브릿지론(Bridge Loan)인 것으로 나타났다.브리지론은 충분한 자금을 모을 때까지 시간이 걸릴 경우 단기 차입 등에 의해 필요자금을 일시적으로 조달하는 대출이다.하종선 현대그룹 전략기획본부 사장은 22일 서울중앙지방법원에서 현대건설 매각과 관련해 열린 '양해각서(MOU) 해지금지 가처분 신청' 첫 심리에 참석한 뒤 기자들과 만나 이 같은 내용을 밝혔다.하 사장은 "나티시스은행에서 빌린 1조 2천억 원은 일종의 브릿지론"이라면서 "대형 글로벌 인수합병(M&A) 경우에 일단 브릿지론을 얻은 후 전략적투자자(SI), 재무적투자자(FI)와 협의가 완결되면 대출 대신 투자의 형태로 대체하는 것이 널리 행해지고 있다"고 말했다.현대그룹은 그간 현대상선 프랑스법인이 나티시스은행으로부터 대출받았다는 1조 2천억 원의 성격을 두고 각종 의혹을 받아왔다. 이에 채권단은 현대그룹에 대출계약서 제출을 요구했지만 현대그룹이 이같은 요청을 거부하면서 채권단은 지난 20일 현대그룹과 맺은 MOU를 해지했다.하 사장은 "한두 달이면 대금을 완납하는 스케줄인데 그걸 못 기다리고 채권단이 MOU를 해지했다"며 "채권단이 제시한 주식매매계약(SPA)에서 현대건설의 주식 등을 담보로 하지 않는다는 조항에 대비해 거액의 현금보증금을 내도록 하는 등 안전장치들이 많은데도 채권단이 한두 달을 못 기다리고 MOU를 해지한 것은 부당하다"고 주장했다.그는 이와 함께 "이번 M&A의 특이점은 컨소시엄 멤버 변경에 대해 채권단의 사전동의가 필요하다는 것"이라며 "그래서 현대상선 프랑스법인을 컨소시엄 멤버로 넣은것도 향후 유치되는 FI, SI가 현대상선 프랑스법인의 유상증자를 통해 인수전에 채권단 동의 없이도 참여시키려는 것이었으며, 현대상선 프랑스법인을 사실상 SPC로 활용하는 방안을 처음부터 추진했다"고 설명했다.하 사장은 "하고 싶은 말이 많았지만 비공개의무 입찰규정 때문에 이런 내용들은 SPA 체결 이후 밝히려 했었다"며 "(이날 심리에서) 변호인이 그간 비공개의무조항 때문에 하지 못했던 말을 속 시원히 얘기했다고 생각한다"고 덧붙였다.한편 현대상선 경영권 보장 등 채권단이 제시한 중재안에 대해 하 사장은 "현대건설 이사회, 소액주주, 주요 주주를 무시하는 법 위에 있는 것과 같은 제안"이라며 "그런 위법한 방안에 공범이 될 수 없다"고 채권단의 제의를 일축했다. 현대그룹이 신청한 가처분 신청에 대한 심리는 오는 24일 다시 열릴 예정이며, 현대그룹은 이날 심리 이후 추가 소송 여부를 결정할 계획이라고 밝혔다.

description.hltext_display: Price rise will be contained soon: Rahul Gandhi
description.author: Tihar inmates paid to make CWG 'supari' claim
description.content:
Chennai: Asserting that the price rise would be contained soon, Congress leader Rahul Gandhi
"We are going to make sure prices are lowered. Leave it to the Prime Minister," he said while interacting with Congress members in Chennai.
In response to Gandhi's advise to party members to work more at the panchayat level and be close to the people, one of them told him that people were bothered by the price rise, including skyrocketing prices of onion, and said they were asking Congressmen what steps are being taken to control the spiral. Rahul Gandhi" alt="" / "The Prime Minister will fix the problem. You don't worry about it. You worry about working at the panchayat level," Gandhi advised the party worker.
Earlier, in his address to newly elected youth Congress members in Tamil Nadu, Gandhi asked them to 'slowly and systematically' work to build the party and bring it back to where it once belonged.
He said that if youth Congress members worked hard and ensured that the party, which has been out of power for nearly three decades grew into a strong one, "a day will come when one from this group can become the chief minister."
However, he hastened to add that there were senior Congress leaders who could reach the top post.

description.hltext_display: El Ibex mantiene los 10.200 puntos a la espera del PIB de EE UU
description.author: CincoDías.com
description.content:
Los números verdes se resisten a abandonar los parqués tras dos jornadas consecutivas de importantes subidas. Hoy, el Ibex recupera alrededor de medio punto porcentual manteniéndose por encima de los 10.200 puntos. Los inversores esperan a la referencia macro del día que será el PIB de EE UU.

09:37
CincoDías.com - Madrid - 22/12/2010
Las Bolsas europeas arrancan la tercera jornada de la semana con ligeros avances a la espera de que se conozca el dato final del PIB del tercer trimestre en EE UU, donde podríamos ver una nueva revisión al alza hasta el +2,8% intertrimestral anualizado, señal de que la economía americana mantiene un buen tono y en breve se situará en niveles previos a la crisis (aunque con un nivel de empleo bastante inferior).
Este es el dato macroeconómico más importante que se va a conocer hoy en EE UU en una sesión que llega cargada de indicadores al otro lado del Atlántico. En este contexto, el selectivo Ibex avanza por tercera jornada consecutiva y después de que ayer despidiera la sesión con un avance del 2% y por encima de los 10.200 puntos.
La jornada de hoy también estará marcada por la evolución de la prima de riesgo. Renta 4 destaca que ayer hubo buenas noticias en cuanto a ejecución presupuestaria en España, donde ayer conocimos datos del déficit del Estado entre enero y noviembre, período en el que ha ascendido al 3,68% del PIB, tras caer un 46% en los primeros nueve meses del año. "Esta positiva evolución permite anticipar el cumplimiento del objetivo 2010 (6,7%), y se suma a los esperanzadores datos de ejecución presupuestaria de las Comunidades Autónomas (hasta el tercer trimestre de 2010, acumulan un déficit del 1,24% del PIB, en línea para cumplir con el objetivo anual del 2,4%, aún cuando existen importantes divergencias entre comunidades)", afirma Renta 4.
Además, los expertos de la firma de análisis señala que la crisis de deuda soberana europea podría tener asimismo un nuevo apoyo para alcanzar una solución: China parece dispuesta a ayudar a la eurozona a resolver este problema, si bien por el momento los diferenciales continúan bastante tensionados, en un entorno de continuos avisos por parte de las agencias de calificación crediticia de posibles revisiones a la baja de ratings (Portugal, España, Grecia...). Aún con todo, Moody?s afirmó ayer que el riesgo de default era reducido (sólo Grecia se sitúa por debajo de grado de inversión).
El resto de Bolsas europeas avanzan ligeras posiciones, con avances del 0,49% en Milán, del 0,03% en Fráncfort, y del 0,01% en Londres, y descensos del 0,10% en París.
Las principales cotizadas españolas optan por las subidas, del 0,81% para Repsol, del 0,56% para Iberdrola, del 0,54% para BBVA, del 0,36% para Endesa, del 0,29% para Santander, del 0,40% para Telefónica, y del 0,24% para Inditex.
BME logra el mayor avance del índice, del 1,03%, en tanto que solo dos valores encajan descensos, Banesto (0,64%) y Acciona (0,18%).
En el mercado de divisas, el euro cotiza a la baja y se cambia a a 1,31 dólares, después de que el martes cerrara en 1,3133 dólares.

description.hltext_display: SolarCraft Hires New Controller
description.content:
Solar Industry Leader hires Controller to help manage growing business
Novato, CA (Vocus/PRWEB) December 21, 2010
Novato and Sonoma-based SolarCraft, a leader in solar energy and solar thermal system installation, announced today that Kristina Harris has joined their company as Controller. Harris’s financial management experience will help lead SolarCraft as they continue to expand and gain market share in the ever-growing Solar Energy Industry.
With 27 years of experience, mostly in construction, as a financial consultant with accounting, organizational development, scheduling and a myriad of process development and management skills, Kristina Harris is well prepared to take on the challenge.
Kristina Harris comes to SolarCraft after five years at LeDuc & Dexter, Inc. a premier green plumbing contractor in the North Bay and Sonoma County. Prior to joining LeDuc & Dexter, Kristina was at Pacific Environments, a landscaping company, where the company grew from 18 to 65 employees and revenues grew from $200,000 to 3.5 million dollars annually. Harris also spent 6 years with Gallaher Construction, which evolved into a multi-faceted real estate development company with over 20 separate business entities. She left there as assistant controller to join Merga Foundations, a concrete company, as controller for two years and then went to Mead Clark Lumber for three years before joining LeDuc & Dexter.
SolarCraft is one of the most experienced solar energy contractors in California. For more than 26 years this certified Green Business has been providing Solar Thermal and Solar Electric services including consultation, design, installation, monitoring and maintenance. SolarCraft is a full-service solar contractor, employing licensed and certified solar installers who are experts in their field. Since 1984 SolarCraft has installed more than 4,500 solar energy systems in California saving customers more than $7 million annually and eliminating the production of more than 28,000 tons of greenhouse gases every year.
# # #
For the original version on PRWeb visit: http://www.prweb.com/releases/prweb2010/12/prweb8030204.htm

description.hltext_display: Tips For Glowing Skin And The Best Skin Care Products
description.content:
Most of us look in the mirror and notice a few blemishes now and again. Some people deal with significantly more, of course. But very few, once out of childhood, will ever get to see flawless skin reflected back. The point is that though it might be unrealistic to expect perfection, most of us would be happy to know about the best skin care products for helping us to realise healthier, clearer skin.
The good news is that we can all make a big difference quite easily. Because if we only make the effort to avoid products containing chemicals and low-grade ingredients, we are already giving our skin a much better chance to recover from stress and imbalance. Many of the 'best' natural skin care products out there do not hold up under scrutiny and can be found to include a wide range of unnatural and compromised ingredients that are not beneficial to the overall health of your skin.
Meanwhile, on the other end of the spectrum, pure plant oils containing 100% pure essential oils are so compatible with our skin's natural composition that they can offer exactly the recipe for helping to maintain visibly healthy skin.
When you consider that our skin has the capacity to recreate its whole surface with brand new tissue 24 times in a year, it makes a lot of sense to want to keep things as natural as possible. These 100% pure essential oils are the result of strict growing and manufacturing processes that ensure the plants organic integrity is retained.
What this means is that we have a medicinal plant extract so similar to the skin's own organic nature that it can directly integrate with specific processes to support optimum healthy cell and tissue activity.
With a nurturing, naturally cleansing botanical blend that is easily absorbed into the skin's layers, getting rid of blackheads and spots is suddenly a whole different story to the one that used to involve abrasive scrubbing and harsh drying products.
Select 100% pure essential oils contain effective antibacterial and cleansing properties that can be incorporated into a deliciously nourishing blend that will leave skin beautifully clean, supple and smooth. No nasty side effects either, only wholesome, safe restoration.
Or if you're way past the adolescent stage and are beginning to notice the diminishing hydration that comes with mature skin and older hormonal shifts, having supple, clearer skin is still always going to be more achievable by working in harmony with our skin's better nature.
The beauty of pure plant oils is that they give us the capacity to emulate intense juicy nutrients that occur deep in the layers of youthful skin. So we can radically refresh tired, stressed and drying skin in just one application, because the tissue will literally drink up the richly hydrating organics to immediately enhance natural rejuvenation processes.
Add that to the fact that we can include therapeutic essential oils that actively support hormone balance, and with regular use the tell tale signs of maturity come to have considerably less impact.
The truth is that pure plant oils can bring an entire range of medicinal properties in the perfect composition for our skin's benefit. For around the eyes where the skin is particularly delicate and sensitive, there is a very finely constituted oil that is incredibly nurturing and restorative (so healing and gentle, in fact, that it is also effective on scar tissue).
And for the body... how about an oil that is not only beautifully hydrating but that also lends itself as the best cleanser for effective pore maintenance, so helping to ensure all over clearer skin?
The very best information offering tips for glowing skin or promising a pathway to clearer skin will always talk about purity and organic integrity, because anything less is basically going to undermine the skin's miraculous natural process of rejuvenation. Which is why pure essential oils and plant oils make the best natural skin care products for bringing out your natural radiant health.
